contexts.context: Arkay's Blessing <mark>prevents</mark> the souls of men, beastmen, and elves...
...elves from being used without consent. Arkay's Law <mark>prevents</mark> those buried with the proper rituals from being raised...
...colossal magical artifact that completely encircles Red Mountain and <mark>prevents</mark> the Blight from spilling its corruption across the rest...
